categories.name: Create Your Own Pizza
categories.description: Build a pizza that's custom made just for you. Start with your favorite crust, add all the toppings you want and just the right amount of cheese and sauce.

items.name: Choose a Crust
items.description: Choose from Hand Tossed, Pan, Thin and Crispy, or Stuffed Crust

items.name: Toppings - Meat
items.description: Pepperoni, Ham, Pork, Beef, Italian Sausage, Bacon, Chicken

items.name: Toppings - Veggie
items.description: Mushrooms, Green Peppers, Onions, Black Olives, Diced Tomatoes, Jalapenos, Pineapple

items.name: Sauce and Cheese
items.description: Choose from extra, easy or none for sauce or cheese.

categories.name: Tuscani Pasta
categories.description: 2 delicious flavors, 2 perfect sizes, 1 happy family

items.name: Tuscani Meaty Marinara
items.description: Savory Italian-seasoned meat sauce and rotini pasta topped with cheese and oven-baked

items.name: Tuscani Creamy Chicken Alfredo
items.description: Grilled chicken breast strips and rotini pasta oven-baked in a creamy alfredo sauce with a layer of melted cheese

items.name: Tuscani Tuesday Deal
items.description: Make Tuesday night pasta night and enjoy two pastas for one great price. Choose your favorite two of our delicious recipes plus get 5 breadsticks, all for just $10!Valid Tuesday only. Limited time offer.

items.name: Ultimate Cheese Lover's Pizza
items.description: Made with alfredo sauce. Covered in creamy alfredo sauce and topped with delicious cheeses

items.name: Pepperoni Lover's Pizza
items.description: Layered with extra pepperoni plus extra cheese for a pepperoni in every bite

items.name: Meat Lover's Pizza
items.description: Loaded with pepperoni, ham, beef, bacon and sausage

items.name: Veggie Lover's Pizza
items.description: Packed with five veggies, including fresh tomatoes, mushrooms, red onions, green peppers, and black olives

items.name: Supreme Pizza
items.description: Our signature blend of pepperoni, pork sausage, beef, mushrooms, red onions and green peppers

items.name: Super Supreme Pizza
items.description: A feast of pepperoni, ham, beef, pork sausage, Italian sausage, red onions, mushrooms, green peppers and black olives

items.name: Chicken Supreme Pizza
items.description: Tender chunks of grilled chicken breast with fresh mushrooms, red onions and green peppers.

items.name: Spicy Sicilian Pizza
items.description: An Italian Tradition with a Fiery Kick: 100% real seasoned beef, Italian sausage, fresh sweet red onions, and spicy jalapenos

items.name: Cheese Lovers Plus
items.description: A massive, melted layer of real cheese topped with any two of your favorite toppings.

items.name: $10 Dinner Box
items.description: Includes one medium rectangular 1-topping pizza, 5 breadsticks with marinara dipping sauce, and 10 cinnamon sticks with icing - all in one convenient box.  Limited time offer.

items.name: Cheesy Bites Pizza
items.description: Bring good times to the dinner table with a large, one-topping pizza surrounded by 28 cheese-filled bites with marinara dipping sauce.   Limited time offer.

categories.name: P'Zone
categories.description: The mighty p'zone, one size fills all: meaty, pepperoni or supremo

items.name: Meaty P'Zone Pizza
items.description: It's multi-meat mayhem in there. Stuffed with all your favorites - pepperoni, ham, Italian sausage, pork, beef, and of course cheese. Served with zesty marinara on the side

items.name: Pepperoni P'Zone Pizza
items.description: If pepperoni's your passion - lots and lots of pepperoni - this is your P'Zone. Served with zesty marinara on the side

items.name: Supremo P'Zone Pizza
items.description: Savory Italian sausage mixes with fresh green peppers and red onions in this meat-and-veggie combo. Served with zesty marinara on the side

categories.name: Wings
categories.description: Hand-tossed and sauced in one of 8 intense flavors

items.name: Buffalo Burnin' Hot
items.description: Extreme heat for the daring buffalo eater

items.name: Buffalo Medium
items.description: Bold buffalo flavor with a spicy kick

items.name: Buffalo Mild
items.description: All of the flavor without the fire

items.name: Spicy Asian
items.description: Far East flavors in a spicy sweet sauce

items.name: Spicy BBQ
items.description: Savory and sassy with just a little kick

items.name: Honey BBQ
items.description: Sweet taste from the honey side of the street

items.name: Lemon Pepper
items.description: Zesty lemon with a peppery punch

items.name: Garlic Parmesan
items.description: The toast of Italy, the taste of two great flavors

items.name: Naked Wings
items.description: No sauce, but crispy, crunchy, tender and tasty

items.name: Breadsticks
items.description: Crispy on the outside, soft and chewy on the inside. Served with marinara dipping sauce

items.name: Cheese Sticks
items.description: Soft, warm breadsticks sprinkled with a flavorful blend of Italian seasonings, smothered in blended mozzarella cheese. Served with marinara dipping sauce

items.name: P'Zone Pizza
items.description: Loaded with toppings and cheese baked in a folded pizza crust and served with marinara sauce on the side! Available in supremo, meaty and pepperoni

items.name: Stuffed Pizza Rollers
items.description: Hand-tossed style dough wrapped around pepperoni and mozzarella cheese, and then generously seasoned with garlic and parmesan. Comes with your choice of marinara or ranch dipping sauce

items.name: Hershey's Chocolate Dunkers
items.description: Hershey's chocolate dunkers is a freshly baked dessert topped with a touch of white chocolate blended with hershey's milk chocolate and served with a rich chocolate dipping sauce

items.name: Cinnamon Sticks
items.description: A freshly baked treat, loaded with cinnamon and sugar. Served with white icing for dipping

items.name: Pepsi
items.description: The bold, robust, effervescently magic cola

items.name: Diet Pepsi
items.description: Light, crisp, refreshing with zero sugar, zero calories and zero carbs

items.name: Mountain Dew
items.description: Way more energizing and thirst quenching with a one of a kind great taste

items.name: Sierra Mist
items.description: Crisp, clean and refreshing lemon lime soda with natural lemon and lime flavors and just the right amount of sweetness to invigorate your senses and leave you totally refreshed
